mapper.select:
select count(*) from QNA
where QNA_SUBJECT like CONCAT('%', #{search}, '%') or QNA_QUESTION like CONCAT('%', #{search}, '%') or QNA_ANSWER like CONCAT('%', #{search}, '%')

select a.QNA_NUM as num, a.MEM_ID as id, a.QNA_SUBJECT as subject, a.QNA_QUESTION as question, a.QNA_UPDATE as `update`, b.QNA_SUBJECT as subject, b.QNA_ANSWER as answer from QNA a left join QNA b on a.QNA_NUM = b.QNA_NUM where a.QNA_NUM = #{num}
